title: Util
description: Utility definitions to be used in other schemas.

monster.description: Keys are other sources to be loaded; values are `otherSources` sources from that source to search for.
monster.markdownDescription: Keys are other sources to be loaded; values are otherSources sources from that source to search for.

url.description: "uri-reference" is unsuitable for brew, as it requires URL-encoding "'" (see: https://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc3986.txt)
url.markdownDescription: "uri-reference" is unsuitable for brew, as it requires URL-encoding "'" (see: https://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc3986.txt)

_sourceString.description: An identifying string, as seen in the JSON in "source" fields.
_sourceString.markdownDescription: An identifying string, as seen in the JSON in "source" fields.

corpusId.description: An ID that will be used to refer to this corpus (adventure/book) in tags.
corpusId.markdownDescription: An ID that will be used to refer to this corpus (adventure/book) in tags.

anyOf.description: An identifying string, as seen in the JSON in "source" fields.
anyOf.markdownDescription: An identifying string, as seen in the JSON in "source" fields.

group.description:
A group name, indexed by page search. E.g. searching "Lycanthrope" would otherwise fail to find anything.

Only works on a given page, and not in Omnisearch.
group.markdownDescription:
A group name, indexed by page search. E.g. searching "Lycanthrope" would otherwise fail to find anything.

Only works on a given page, and not in Omnisearch.

tag.description: A tag used in the renderer, e.g. "creature"
tag.markdownDescription: A tag used in the renderer, e.g. "creature"

max.description: The max ability score this ASI allows (otherwise assumed to be 20).
max.markdownDescription: The max ability score this ASI allows (otherwise assumed to be 20).

visible.description: Governs whether or not the class name is visible in the list display/prerequisite line. *Not* recommended for features which implicitly carry a class restriction, such as Eldritch Invocations.
visible.markdownDescription: Governs whether or not the class name is visible in the list display/prerequisite line. *Not* recommended for features which implicitly carry a class restriction, such as Eldritch Invocations.

visible.description: Governs whether or not the class name is visible in the list display/prerequisite line. *Not* recommended for features which implicitly carry a class restriction, such as Eldritch Invocations.
visible.markdownDescription: Governs whether or not the class name is visible in the list display/prerequisite line. *Not* recommended for features which implicitly carry a class restriction, such as Eldritch Invocations.

choose.description:
A range prerequisite spells, formatted similarly to the options in a {@filter ...} tag.

For example: "level=0|class=Wizard"
choose.markdownDescription:
A range prerequisite spells, formatted similarly to the options in a {@filter ...} tag.

For example: "level=0|class=Wizard"

otherSummary.description: A free text prerequisite, with a shortened form for list display.
otherSummary.markdownDescription: A free text prerequisite, with a shortened form for list display.

displayEntry.description: Optional long-form name to be used in the rendered entity.
displayEntry.markdownDescription: Optional long-form name to be used in the rendered entity.

displayEntry.description: Optional long-form name to be used in the rendered entity.
displayEntry.markdownDescription: Optional long-form name to be used in the rendered entity.

spellcasting2020.description: Renders with the updated text found in UA2020: Feats
spellcasting2020.markdownDescription: Renders with the updated text found in UA2020: Feats

spellcastingFeature.description: A more restrictive spellcasting variant; specifically "Spellcasting Feature"
spellcastingFeature.markdownDescription: A more restrictive spellcasting variant; specifically "Spellcasting Feature"

spellcastingPrepared.description: A more restrictive spellcasting variant; specifically "Spellcasting feature from a class that prepares spells"
spellcastingPrepared.markdownDescription: A more restrictive spellcasting variant; specifically "Spellcasting feature from a class that prepares spells"

note.description: An additional note that accompanies the proficiencies, but is not part of them.
note.markdownDescription: An additional note that accompanies the proficiencies, but is not part of them.

alignment.description:
- L: Lawful
- N: Neutral
- NX: Neutral (law/chaos axis)
- NY: Neutral (good/evil axis)
- C: Chaotic
- G: Good
- E: Evil
- U: Unaligned
- A: Any
alignment.markdownDescription:
- L: Lawful
- N: Neutral
- NX: Neutral (law/chaos axis)
- NY: Neutral (good/evil axis)
- C: Chaotic
- G: Good
- E: Evil
- U: Unaligned
- A: Any

- D: Diminutive

- C: Colossal

anyOf.$comment: This is a custom pre-processor tag, which merges together the array of objects into one. This allows proper inheritance, which JSON schema don't really do.

startingEquipment.description: Optional well-structured data version of the "default" property, for use in applications that require it.

displayName.description: The display name this item should be given
displayName.markdownDescription: The display name this item should be given

containsValue.description: The value (in copper pieces) that this piece of equipment contains in coins.
containsValue.markdownDescription: The value (in copper pieces) that this piece of equipment contains in coins.

special.description: The name of a non-statted item, such as "wooden stake"
special.markdownDescription: The name of a non-statted item, such as "wooden stake"

worthValue.description: The worth (in copper pieces) of this piece of equipment.
worthValue.markdownDescription: The worth (in copper pieces) of this piece of equipment.

containsValue.description: The value (in copper pieces) that this piece of equipment contains in coins.
containsValue.markdownDescription: The value (in copper pieces) that this piece of equipment contains in coins.

oneOf.description: Features gained when the total count of features increases according to level.
oneOf.markdownDescription: Features gained when the total count of features increases according to level.

oneOf.description: Features gained at the exact levels specified.
oneOf.markdownDescription: Features gained at the exact levels specified.

oneOf.description: Features gained at the level this feature is gained.
oneOf.markdownDescription: Features gained at the level this feature is gained.

oneOf.description: Feats gained when the total count of feats increases according to level.
oneOf.markdownDescription: Feats gained when the total count of feats increases according to level.

oneOf.description: Feats gained at the exact levels specified.
oneOf.markdownDescription: Feats gained at the exact levels specified.

oneOf.description: Feats gained at the level this feat is gained.
oneOf.markdownDescription: Feats gained at the level this feat is gained.

spellListSpellRef.description: A reference to a spell or an existing spell list, linked by name and source. Assumes PHB as the source, if none is provided.

oneOf.description: A spell UID of the form "fireball" (PHB source assumed by default) or "shape water|xge"
oneOf.markdownDescription: A spell UID of the form "fireball" (PHB source assumed by default) or "shape water|xge"

spellListSpellRef.markdownDescription: A reference to a spell or an existing spell list, linked by name and source. Assumes PHB as the source, if none is provided.

markdownDescription: Utility definitions to be used in other schemas.
